      • isUserConfigRegistryConsistent

        Boolean isUserConfigRegistryConsistent()
                                throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Method returns true if the underling registry is marked as consistent.
        Returns:
        if the user config registry is consistent
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - if the check fails

      • isAuthorizationGroupConfigRegistryConsistent

        Boolean isAuthorizationGroupConfigRegistryConsistent()
                                              throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Method returns true if the underling registry is marked as consistent.
        Returns:
        if the authorization group config registry is consistent
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - if the check fails

      • getUserIdByUserName

        String getUserIdByUserName(String userName)
                    throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                           org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Retrieves a user ID according to a given user name. If multiple users happen to have the same user name, the first one is returned.
        Parameters:
        userName -
        Returns:
        User ID
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - If no user with the given user name could be found.
